$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/readme.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/readme
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/readme.text:
Installation and usage tutorial is available at [[Fishing Manual|https://oflg.github.io/fishing-manual/]].

可在 [[钓鱼手册|https://oflg.github.io/fishing-manual/]] 查看安装使用教程。

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/action-fishing.j.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/action-fishing.js

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editortoolbar/setcloze
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.caption: <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setcloze]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setcloze]]}}}/>
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.text:
\define tv-action-refresh-policy() always

<$action-sendmessage
    $message="tm-edit-text-operation"
    $param="save-selection"
    tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
    field="save-selection"
/>

<$list
    filter="[<targetTiddler>]"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$fieldmangler>
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-add-tag"
                $param="?"
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler=<<targetTiddler>>
                draft.title={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!save-selection}!is[blank]]~[<targetTiddler>get[draft.title]]}}}
                caption="{{||Cloze}}"
            />
        </$fieldmangler>
    </$navigator>
</$list>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editortoolbar/setexcerpt

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/editorto.text:
\define tv-action-refresh-policy() always

<$action-sendmessage
    $message="tm-edit-text-operation"
    $param="save-selection"
    tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
    field="save-selection"
/>

<$list
    filter="[<targetTiddler>]"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$fieldmangler>
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-add-tag"
                $param="?"
            />
            <$action-setfield
                draft.title={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!save-selection}!is[blank]]~[<targetTiddler>get[draft.title]]}}}
                interval={{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}}
                due={{{[{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}due[]]}}}
                caption="{{||Excerpt}}"
            />
        </$fieldmangler>
    </$navigator>
</$list>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingrod/addfilter
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$reveal
        default={{{[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]match{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
        type="match"
        text=""
        animate="yes"
    >
        <$button
            tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[addfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[addfiltertip]]+[addsuffix[ ]addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[addfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[addfiltertip]]+[addsuffix[ ]addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;"
        >
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}}
                type="application/json"
            />
            {{$:/core/images/plus-button}}
        </$button>
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingrod/commonfilter
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.text:
<$reveal default={{{[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]count[]]}}} type="gt" text="0" animate="yes" > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[commonfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[commonfiltertip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[commonfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[commonfiltertip]]}}} popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;width:auto;height:auto;" > {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" >
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]sort[title]]" variable="fishingrod" > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fillfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fillfiltertip]]+[addsuffix]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fillfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fillfiltertip]]+[addsuffix]}}} popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" fishingrod=<> /> <$text text={{{[addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]get[caption]]~[]}}}/>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingrod/customisefilter
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.text:
<$reveal default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]match{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" >
<$button popup=<> tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[customisefiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[customisefiltertip]]+[addsuffix[ ]addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[customisefiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[customisefiltertip]]+[addsuffix[ ]addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" fish="" /> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" >
<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setalias]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setalias]]}}}/>
<$edit-text tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}} field="caption" placeholder={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[typealias]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[typealias]]}}} tag="input"/>
<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setorder]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setorder]]}}}/> <$list filter="due undue new" variable="pondname" >
<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}}/> <$select tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}} index={{{[addsuffix[order]]}}} default={{{[match[due]then{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!autoorder}]~[match[undue]then{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!dueorder}]~[match[new]then{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!createdorder}]}}} > <$list filter="autoorder dueorder createdorder azorder zaorder randomorder" variable="pondorder" >

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingrod/unaddfilter
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$reveal
        default={{{[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]match{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
        type="nomatch"
        text=""
        animate="yes"
    >
        <$button
            tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[unaddfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[unaddfiltertip]]+[addsuffix[ ]addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[unaddfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[unaddfiltertip]]+[addsuffix[ ]addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            class="tc-btn-invisible"
            style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;"
        >
            <$action-deletetiddler
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                fishingrod=""
            />
            {{$:/core/images/cancel-button}}
        </$button>
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingrod/viewfilter
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/buttons/fishingr.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$reveal
        default={{{[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]match{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
        type="nomatch"
        text=""
        animate="yes"
    >
        <$button
            tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[viewfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[viewfiltertip]]+[addsuffix[ ]addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[viewfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[viewfiltertip]]+[addsuffix[ ]addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}}
            class="tc-btn-invisible"
            style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;"
        >
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                text=""
                fish=""
            />
            <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" $value="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]][{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]shadowsource[]][subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}is[tiddler]][{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]shadowsource[]plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]]"/>
            <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/input" $value="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]][{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]shadowsource[]][subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}is[tiddler]][{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]shadowsource[]plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]]"/>
            <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/refresh" text="yes"/>
            <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803" $value="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter"/>
            <$action-navigate $to="$:/AdvancedSearch"/>
            <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=".tc-advanced-search input"/>
            {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}
        </$button>
    </$reveal>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishhead.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishhead
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishhead.text:
<$reveal default={{{[tag[?]][has[due]][match{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}]}}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" >
<$reveal state=<> type="match" text="hide" animate="yes" > <> <$list filter="[[?]][all[current]tags[]sort[title]]-[all[current]backlinks[]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop" />
<$reveal state="$:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/core/ui/Buttons/fold-bar" type="nomatch" text="show" animate="yes" > <$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" default="show" retain="yes" animate="yes" > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Fold/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Fold/Caption}} class="tc-fold-banner" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-fold-tiddler" $param=<> foldedState=<> /> {{$:/core/images/chevron-up}} <$reveal tag="div" type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="show" default="show" retain="yes" animate="yes" > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Unfold/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Unfold/Caption}} class="tc-unfold-banner" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-fold-tiddler" $param=<> foldedState=<> /> {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}}

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishing.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishing
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishing.text:
<$list filter="[match{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}]" > <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="hide" animate="yes" > ---
{{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond}}
<$fieldmangler> <$list filter="learn forget remember grasp" variable="ease" > <$list filter="[has[grade]then[review]else[learn]][match[learn]else[review]]+[count[]match[1]]" variable="null" > <$let easetip={{{[addsuffix[tip]]}}} > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style={{{[match[learn]then[margin-left:10px;color:green;]]~[match[forget]then[margin-left:10px;color:red;]]~[match[remember]then[margin-left:10px;color:green;]]~[match[grasp]then[margin-left:10px;color:blue;]]}}} > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="?" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="!" /> <$list filter="[!search:caption:literal[Excerpt}}]]" variable="null" > <$action-fishing $grade={{{[match[learn]then[-1]]~[match[forget]then[0]]~[match[remember]then[1]]~[match[grasp]then[2]]}}} /> <$list filter="[search:caption:literal[Excerpt}}]]" variable="null" > <$action-setfield interval={{{[get[interval]]~[{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}else[1]subtract[1]]+[add[1]]}}} due={{{[get[interval]]~[{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}else[1]subtract[1]]+[add[1]due[]]}}} /> <$list filter="[tags[]]:intersection[backlinks[]]+[search:caption:literal[Excerpt}}]]" variable="backexcerpt" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $timestamp="no" interval={{{[match[learn]then[0]]~[match[forget]then[1]]~[match[remember]then[0]]~[match[grasp]then[-1]][get[interval]]+[sum[]]}}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}}/> <$button popup=<> tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[moretip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[moretip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[moretip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[moretip]]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="padding-left:10px;" > ⁝ <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="aboveleft" animate="yes" >
<$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[discardtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[discardtip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[discardtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[discardtip]]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="padding:3px 10px;" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="?" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="!" /> <$action-deletefield due interval grade difficulty stability retrievability lapses reps review /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[discard]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[discard]]}}}/> <$button /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> + 7 <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[add1tip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[add1tip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[add1tip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[add1tip]]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="padding:3px 10px;" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="?" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="!" /> <$action-setfield due={{{[[1]due[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> + 1

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat.caption: {{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icon}} <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishing]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishing]]}}}/>
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat.text:
\whitespace trim <$button popup=<> tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingtip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingtip]]}}} class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected" > <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingtip]]}}}/> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
{{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond}} {{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod}}

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond.text:
<$list
    filter="due undue new"
    variable="pondname"
>
    <$let
        pondordername={{{[<pondname>addsuffix[order]]}}}
        fishingrod={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}!is[blank]else{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!rod}]}}}
        fishingpond={{{[<pondname>match[due]then{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!duepond}]~[<pondname>match[undue]then{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!unduepond}]~[<pondname>match[new]then{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!newpond}]}}}
        fishingorder={{{[<fishingrod>addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]getindex<pondordername>]~[<pondname>match[due]then{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!autoorder}]~[<pondname>match[undue]then{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!dueorder}]~[<pondname>match[new]then{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond!!createdorder}]}}}
    >
        <$button
            tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingpondtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingpondtip]]}}}
            aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingpondtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingpondtip]]}}}
            class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"
            style="padding-right:10px;"
        >
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                text=""
                type=""
                fishingrod=<<fishingrod>>
                fishingpond=<<fishingpond>>
                fishingorder=<<fishingorder>>
                fish={{{[subfilter<fishingrod>subfilter<fishingpond>subfilter<fishingorder>first[]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
            />
            <$action-navigate
                $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
            />
            <$action-popup
                $state=<<qualify "$:/state/popup/$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingdeck">>
                $coords=""
            />
            <$text
                text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex<pondname>]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex<pondname>]}}}
            />
            <$count
                filter="[subfilter<fishingrod>subfilter<fishingpond>]"
            />
        </$button>
    </$let>
</$list>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod.text:
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" field="fishingrod" tag="input" focus="true" placeholder="[tag[?]]" inputActions='<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" fish=""/>' />
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/fishingrod/Button]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icons/setcloze.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icons/setcloze
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icons/setcloze.text:
<svg
  width="22pt"
  height="22pt"
  viewBox="0 0 128 128"
  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
  class="tc-image-bold tc-image-button"
>
  <g>
    <text
      transform="matrix(2.56467, 0, 0, 6.78366, -70.4793, -361.722)"
      font-weight="bold"
      xml:space="preserve"
      text-anchor="start"
      font-size="24"
      id="svg_5"
      y="71.27162"
      x="26.8242"
      stroke-width="0"
      >
        →
      </text>
    <text
      transform="matrix(3.88287, 0, 0, 6.21184, -350.205, -233.081)"
      font-weight="bold"
      xml:space="preserve"
      text-anchor="start"
      font-size="24"
      y="56.16649"
      x="106.39803"
      stroke-width="0"
      id="svg_2"
    >
      C
    </text>
  </g>
</svg>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB.text:
fishing: Fishing
fishingtip: Incremental learning
exciseexcerpt: Excise to Excerpt Tiddler
exciseexcerpttip: Excise the selected text into an Excerpt Tiddler
excisequestion: Excise to Question Tiddler
excisequestiontip: Excise the selected text into a Question Tiddler
setexcerpt: Set as Excerpt Tiddler
setexcerpttip: Set this tiddler as Excerpt Tiddler and the selected text as it's title
setquestion: Set as Q&A Question Tiddler
setquestiontip: Set this tiddler as Q&A Question Tiddler and the selected text as it's title
setcloze: Set as Cloze Question Tiddler
setclozetip: Set this tiddler as Cloze Question Tiddler and the selected text as it's title
setselect: Set as Select Question Tiddler
setselecttip: Set this tiddler as Select Question Tiddler and the selected text as it's title
marktitle: Mark title
marktitletip: Mark the selected text as title of Excerpt Tiddler or Q&A Question Tiddler. For example: __''title''__
markclozeoption: Mark cloze or option
markclozeoptiontip: Mark the selected text as a cloze of Cloze Question Tiddler or a option of Select Question Tiddler. For example: __cloze__ or __option__
fold: Unfold or fold this tiddler
learn: next
learntip: Learn one more
forget: forget
forgettip: Forget the answer
remember: remember
remembertip: Remember the answer
grasp: grasp
grasptip: Grasp the question
moretip: More
discard: discard
discardtip: No more learning this tiddler
add7tip: Learning this tiddler next week
add1tip: Learning this tiddler tomorrow
fishingpondtip: Learn this group of tiddlers
due: due:
undue: undue:
new: new:
commonfiltertip: Commonly used Filter Expression
addfiltertip: Add to commonly used Filter Expression:
unaddfiltertip: Unadd this Filter Expression:
fillfiltertip: Fill in this Filter Expression:
customisefiltertip: Customise the behaviour of this Filter Expression:
setalias: Alias
typealias: Type alias
setorder: Learning order
autoorder: Auto priority
dueorder: Due date
createdorder: Created date
azorder: Title A-Z
zaorder: Title Z-A
randomorder: Random
viewfiltertip: View tiddlers related to this Filter Expression:
settings: These settings let you customise the behaviour of Fishing.
globalsettings: Global Settings
setrecall: Retention
setrecalltip: Must be between 0.7 and 0.95
setinterval: Initial interval day of Excerpt Tiddlers
setintervaltip: Must be a positive integer
pluginlibrary: Fishing Plugin Library
pluginlibrarytip: This plugin library can be used to install and update plugins and Learning Packs related to Fishing.

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/zh-Han.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/zh-Hans
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/zh-Han.text:
fishing: 钓鱼
fishingtip: 渐进学习
excisequestion: 剪切到问题条目
excisequestiontip: 剪切所选文本到一个问题条目
exciseexcerpt: 剪切到摘抄条目
exciseexcerpttip: 剪切所选文本到一个摘抄条目
setexcerpt: 设为摘抄条目
setexcerpttip: 设置此条目为摘抄条目及所选文本为其标题
setquestion: 设为问答题条目
setquestiontip: 设置此条目为问答题条目及所选文本为其标题
setcloze: 设为填空题条目
setclozetip: 设置此条目为填空题条目及所选文本为其标题
setselect: 设为选择题条目
setselecttip: 设置此条目为选择题条目及所选文本为其标题
marktitle: 标为标题
marktitletip: 标记所选文本为摘抄条目或问答题条目的标题。例如：__''标题''__
markclozeoption: 标为挖空或选项
markclozeoptiontip: 标记所选文本为填空题条目的一个挖空或选择题的一个选项。例如：__挖空__或__选项__
fold: 展开或折叠此条目
learn: 下一个
learntip: 已学习此条目再学习下一个
forget: 忘记
forgettip: 忘记答案
remember: 记得
remembertip: 记得答案
grasp: 掌握
grasptip: 掌握问题
moretip: 更多
discard: 舍弃
discardtip: 不再学习此条目
add7tip: 下周学习此条目
add1tip: 明天学习此条目
fishingpondtip: 学习此组条目
due: 已到期：
undue: 未到期：
new: 新添加：
commonfiltertip: 常用筛选器表达式
addfiltertip: 添加到常用筛选器表达式：
unaddfiltertip: 取消添加此常用筛选器表达式：
fillfiltertip: 填入此筛选器表达式：
customisefiltertip: 自定义此筛选器表达式的行为：
setalias: 别名
typealias: 输入别名
setorder: 学习顺序
autoorder: 自动优先级
dueorder: 到期时间
createdorder: 创建时间
azorder: 标题 A-Z
zaorder: 标题 Z-A
randomorder: 随机
viewfiltertip: 查看此筛选器表达式的相关条目：
settings: 这些高级设置让您定制钓鱼的行为。
globalsettings: 全局设置
setrecall: 目标保留率
setrecalltip: 必须在 0.7 和 0.95 之间
setinterval: 摘抄条目的初始间隔天数
setintervaltip: 必须是正整数
pluginlibrary: 钓鱼插件库
pluginlibrarytip: 此插件库可用来安装和更新钓鱼插件的相关插件和学习包。

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros/fsrs.js.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros/fsrs.js

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros.text:
\define fishbreadcrumbs()
<$let
    currentTiddler={{{[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[first[]]}}}
>
    <$reveal
        default=<<currentTiddler>>
        type="nomatch"
        text=""
    >
        <<fishbreadcrumbs>>
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal
        default=<<currentTiddler>>
        type="nomatch"
        text=""
    >
        {{||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}}>
    </$reveal>
</$let>
\end

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/operations/excis.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/operations/excisefish.js

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/styles.css.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/styles.css

$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/Fishing.title: $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/Fishing/fishing
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/Fishing.caption: <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[globalsettings]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[globalsettings]]}}}/>
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/Fishing.text:
|<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setrecall]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setrecall]]}}}/> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data" index="requestRetention" placeholder="0.9" tag="input"/>
@@color:red;font-size:10px;<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setrecalltip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setrecalltip]]}}}/>@@ | |<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setinterval]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setinterval]]}}}/> |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data" field="requestInterval" placeholder="1" tag="input"/>
@@color:red;font-size:10px;<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[setintervaltip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[setintervaltip]]}}}/>@@ |

$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-dis.title: $:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-discard
$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-dis.text:
<$list
    filter="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}!is[blank]]"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$fieldmangler>
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-remove-tag"
                $param="?"
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-add-tag"
                $param="!"
            />
            <$action-deletefield
                due
                interval
                grade
                difficulty
                stability
                retrievability
                lapses
                reps
                review
            />
            <$action-deletetiddler
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                text=""
                type=""
                fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-close-tiddler"
            />
            <$action-navigate
                $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
            />
        </$fieldmangler>
    </$navigator>
</$list>

$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-for.title: $:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-forget
$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-for.text:
<$list
    filter="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}!is[blank]has[grade]]"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$fieldmangler>
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-add-tag"
                $param="?"
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-remove-tag"
                $param="!"
            />
            <$action-fishing
                $grade="0"
            />
            <$list
                filter="[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[search:caption:literal[Excerpt}}]]"
                variable="backexcerpt"
            >
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler=<<backexcerpt>>
                    $timestamp="no"
                    interval={{{[<backexcerpt>get[interval]add[1]]}}}
                />
            </$list>
            <$action-deletetiddler
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                text=""
                type=""
                fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-close-tiddler"
            />
            <$action-navigate
                $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
            />
        </$fieldmangler>
    </$navigator>
</$list>

$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-gra.title: $:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-grasp
$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-gra.text:
<$list
    filter="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}!is[blank]has[grade]]"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$fieldmangler>
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-add-tag"
                $param="?"
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-remove-tag"
                $param="!"
            />
            <$action-fishing
                $grade="2"
            />
            <$list
                filter="[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[search:caption:literal[Excerpt}}]]"
                variable="backexcerpt"
            >
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler=<<backexcerpt>>
                    $timestamp="no"
                    interval={{{[<backexcerpt>get[interval]add[-1]]}}}
                />
            </$list>
            <$action-deletetiddler
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                text=""
                type=""
                fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-close-tiddler"
            />
            <$action-navigate
                $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
            />
        </$fieldmangler>
    </$navigator>
</$list>

$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-lea.title: $:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-learn
$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-lea.text:
<$list
    filter="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}!is[blank]!has[grade]]"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$fieldmangler>
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-add-tag"
                $param="?"
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-remove-tag"
                $param="!"
            />
            <$list
                filter="[<currentTiddler>!search:caption:literal[Excerpt}}]]"
                variable="null"
            >
                <$action-fishing
                    $grade="-1"
                />
            </$list>
            <$list
                filter="[<currentTiddler>search:caption:literal[Excerpt}}]]"
                variable="null"
            >
                <$action-setfield
                    interval={{{[<currentTiddler>get[interval]]~[{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}else[1]subtract[1]]+[add[1]]}}}
                    due={{{[<currentTiddler>get[interval]]~[{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/data!!requestInterval}else[1]subtract[1]]+[add[1]due[]]}}}
                />
            </$list>
            <$action-deletetiddler
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                text=""
                type=""
                fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}}
            />
            <$action-log fishingrod={{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}} fishingpond={{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}} fishingorder={{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}}/>
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-close-tiddler"
            />
            <$action-navigate
                $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
            />
        </$fieldmangler>
    </$navigator>
</$list>

$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-rem.title: $:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-remember
$:/core/ui/KeyboardShortcuts/fishing-rem.text:
<$list
    filter="[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}!is[blank]has[grade]]"
>
    <$navigator
        story="$:/StoryList"
        history="$:/HistoryList"
        relinkOnRename="yes"
    >
        <$fieldmangler>
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-add-tag"
                $param="?"
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-remove-tag"
                $param="!"
            />
            <$action-fishing
                $grade="1"
            />
            <$list
                filter="[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[search:caption:literal[Excerpt}}]]"
                variable="backexcerpt"
            >
                <$action-setfield
                    $tiddler=<<backexcerpt>>
                    $timestamp="no"
                    interval={{{[<backexcerpt>get[interval]add[0]]}}}
                />
            </$list>
            <$action-deletetiddler
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
                text=""
                type=""
                fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingorder}first[]]}}}
            />
            <$action-setfield
                $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
                text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}has[grade]then[hide]else[show]]}}}
            />
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-close-tiddler"
            />
            <$action-navigate
                $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
            />
        </$fieldmangler>
    </$navigator>
</$list>

Cloze.title: Cloze
Cloze.text: <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="show" animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="nomatch" text=<> animate="yes" > {{!!title}} <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]count[]]}}} type="gteq" text="3" animate="yes" > <$list filter="[{!!title}split[__]]" variable="titleitem" counter="counter" > <$reveal default={{{[remainder[2]]}}} type="nomatch" text="0" > <> <$reveal default={{{[remainder[2]]}}} type="match" text="0" > <$let clozeid=<> clozecontent=<> clozecontent={{{[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatch[show]thenelse[` `]]}}} > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" $index=<> $value={{{[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatch[show]then[]else[show]]}}} /> <> <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]count[]]}}} type="lt" text="3" animate="yes" > {{!!title}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" animate="yes" > {{!!title}}

Excerpt.title: Excerpt
Excerpt.text:
<$reveal
    default={{{[{!!title}search:title[/]]}}}
    type="nomatch"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    <$text
        text={{{[{!!text}split[]limit[13]join[]addsuffix[...]]}}}
    />
</$reveal>
<$reveal
    default={{{[{!!title}search:title[/]]}}}
    type="match"
    text=""
    animate="yes"
>
    {{!!title}}
</$reveal>

Question.title: Question
Question.text: {{!!title}} <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$edit tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}} minHeight="15px" class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body" > <$set value=<> name="targetTiddler" > <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]!has[draft.of]]" > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" class="tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-wrapper" style="display: none;" > <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/toolbar/button" mode="inline" /> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorTools]!has[draft.of]]" > <$list filter={{!!condition}} variable="list-condition" > <$transclude/> <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" > <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" animate="yes" > <$diff-text source={{$:/temp/fishing}} dest={{!!text}} />

Select.title: Select
Select.text: <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="nomatch" text=<> animate="yes" > {{!!title}} <$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]count[]]}}} type="gteq" text="3" animate="yes" > {{{[{!!title}split[__]first[]]}}} <$list filter="[{!!title}split[__]]" variable="titleitem" counter="counter" > <$reveal default={{{[remainder[2]]}}} type="match" text="0" > <$let optionid={{{[divide[2]]}}} optioncontent=<> selectid={{{[{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]count[]match[1]then[id]else]}}} > <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="show" animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]count[]]}}} type="lteq" text="1" > <$radio tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" index=<> value=<> default="" > <> <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]count[]]}}} type="gt" text="1" > <$checkbox tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" index=<> checked=<> unchecked="" default="" > <> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" animate="yes" > <$button disabled="yes" class="tc-btn-invisible" > <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]search-replace[A],[1]search-replace[B],[2]search-replace[C],[3]search-replace[D],[4]search-replace[E],[5]search-replace[F],[6]search-replace[G],[7]search-replace[H],[8]search-replace[I],[9]matchthen[1]else[0]]=[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatchthen[1]else[0]]+[join[]]}}} type="match" text="00" animate="yes" > {{$:/core/images/blank}} <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]search-replace[A],[1]search-replace[B],[2]search-replace[C],[3]search-replace[D],[4]search-replace[E],[5]search-replace[F],[6]search-replace[G],[7]search-replace[H],[8]search-replace[I],[9]matchthen[1]else[0]]=[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatchthen[1]else[0]]+[join[]]}}} type="match" text="01" animate="yes" > {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]search-replace[A],[1]search-replace[B],[2]search-replace[C],[3]search-replace[D],[4]search-replace[E],[5]search-replace[F],[6]search-replace[G],[7]search-replace[H],[8]search-replace[I],[9]matchthen[1]else[0]]=[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatchthen[1]else[0]]+[join[]]}}} type="match" text="10" animate="yes" > {{$:/core/images/warning}} <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]split[]search-replace[A],[1]search-replace[B],[2]search-replace[C],[3]search-replace[D],[4]search-replace[E],[5]search-replace[F],[6]search-replace[G],[7]search-replace[H],[8]search-replace[I],[9]matchthen[1]else[0]]=[[$:/temp/fishing]getindexmatchthen[1]else[0]]+[join[]]}}} type="match" text="11" animate="yes" > {{$:/core/images/done-button}} <> <$reveal default={{{[{!!title}split[__]count[]]}}} type="lt" text="3" animate="yes" > {{!!title}}
